name: Snoot Game
storyline: You play as Anon, a young guy who recently transferred to Vulcan High School from his former school due to "unspecified circumstances". Planning at first to spend the remaining 6 months of the school month so that no one pays attention to him and does not get into accidents, Anon soon finds himself taken out of his pool of serenity, after life forces him to make friends with local students, in particular with members of the musical group VVURM DRAMA and their soloist Fung. Going against his desire not to get into trouble, Anon will need to both help people around him deal with their problems in their personal lives, and overcome his own insecurities…
summary:
You play as Anon, a lonely, faceless, nobody, reject who finds himself in the dinosaur themed acid trip of a school named Volcano High. Here Anon meets the qt ptero known as Fang and their clown-vomit colored posse of reject friends and other associated thorns-in-the-side. All of whom, you can read about here.

This game is a parody of Goodbye Volcano High.
